45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:When two persons indulge in hurling (abuses) upon one another, it would be the first one who would be the sinner so long as the oppressed does not transgress the limits
